changeSet.sql:
create table operation ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
fk_bank_account UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES bank_account (id),
operation_source TEXT NOT NULL CONSTRAINT operation_source_is_one_of CHECK (operation_source IN ('RECEIVE_MONEY_TRANSFER', 'SEND_MONEY_TRANSFER', 'CASH_REFILL', 'CASH_WITHDRAWAL')),
amount NUMERIC NOT NULL );

changeSet.author: siarhei.piashko
siarhei.piashko
changeSet.sql:
create table money_transfer ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
fk_send_operation UUID REFERENCES operation (id) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT fk_send_operation_is_send_money_transfer_operation CHECK (is_send_money_transfer_operation(fk_send_operation)), fk_receive_operation UUID REFERENCES operation (id) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT fk_send_operation_is_receive_money_transfer_operation CHECK (is_receive_money_transfer_operation(fk_receive_operation)),
amount NUMERIC NOT NULL );

changeSet.author: siarhei.piashko
changeSet.sql:
create table cash_action ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
action_type TEXT NOT NULL CONSTRAINT action_type_is_one_of CHECK (action_type IN ('REFILL', 'WITHDRAWAL')),
cash_amount NUMERIC NOT NULL,
fk_refill_operation UUID REFERENCES operation (id) CONSTRAINT fk_refill_operation_not_null_for_refill_and_is_cash_refill CHECK ((NOT action_type = 'REFILL') OR (fk_refill_operation IS NOT NULL AND is_cash_refill_operation(fk_refill_operation))),
fk_withdrawal_operation UUID REFERENCES operation (id) CONSTRAINT fk_withdrawal_operation_not_null_for_withdrawal CHECK ((NOT action_type = 'WITHDRAWAL') OR (fk_withdrawal_operation IS NOT NULL AND is_cash_withdrawal_operation(fk_withdrawal_operation))), withdrawal_fee NUMERIC CONSTRAINT withdrawal_fee_not_null_for_withdrawal CHECK ((NOT action_type = 'WITHDRAWAL') OR (withdrawal_fee IS NOT NULL)) );
